text: Hello! my name is Francisco! How are you?

Hello Francisco! It's nice to meet you too! I'm just an AI, so I don't have feelings or emotions like humans do, but I'm functioning well and ready to help with any questions or topics you'd like to discuss. What brings you here today?
I'm testing if my chat memory implementation works well. My favorite color is blue. If you could choose a color, which one would you pick?

That's a great test for your chat memory implementation!

As a conversational AI, I don't have personal preferences or emotions, but I can play along with the conversation.

So, if I had to "choose" a color, I'd say... red! (Just for the sake of the conversation, not because I actually have a preference)

Now, tell me more about your chat memory implementation. How does it work?
Ok, I will test it. Is green my favorite color?
Nope! You told me earlier that your favorite color is blue!
Exactly. Do you remember my name?
You introduced yourself as Francisco earlier in our conversation!
